mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_organ_message ( CHECK_TITLE, CHECK_CONTENT, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_DATA ) VALUE ( #{checkTitle}, #{checkContent}, #{createUserId}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_organ_message SET CHECK_TITLE=#{checkTitle}, CHECK_CONTENT=#{checkContent}, UPDATE_USER_ID=#{updateUserId}, UPDATE_DATA=NOW() WHERE ID=#{id}
